text: Jack Davenport (born 1 March 1973) is an English movie and television actor. His first important role was in the mid-1990s in the television series This Life. He has since become best known for his roles in the Coupling television series and the Pirates of the Caribbean series of movies. He has also appeared in many other Hollywood movies such as The Talented Mr. Ripley . He often plays pompous or clumsy characters. He played a lead character in the TV series Swingtown. Davenport married actress Michelle Gomez on 1 May 2000. Their son was born in 2010. == Filmography == * This Life (1996) * The Moth (1997) (TV) * Fierce Creatures (1997) * Macbeth (1998) * Tale of the Mummy (1998) * Ultraviolet (1998) (TV) * The Wisdom of Crocodiles (1998) * Ticks (1999) * The Cookie Thief (1999) * The Talented Mr. Ripley (1999) * The Wyvern Mystery (2000) (TV) * Coupling (2000â€“2004) (TV) * Subterrain (2001) * Not Afraid, Not Afraid (2001) * Look (2001) * Gypsy Woman (2001) * Asylum't' (2001) (TV) * Offending Angels (2001) * The Bunker (2001) * Dickens (2002) (TV) * A Very English Genius (2002) (TV - narrator) * The Showbiz Set (2002) (TV -narrator) * The Real Jane Austen (2002) TV * The Boy Who Would be King (2003) (TV - narrator) * Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003) * Beethoven - Eroica (2003) (TV) * The Welsh Great Escape (2003) (TV) * Terrible Kisses (2004) * Agatha Christie's Marple (2004) (TV) * The Libertine (2005) * The Incredible Journey of Mary Bryant (2005) (TV) * The Wedding Date (2005) * A Higher Agency (2005) * Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest (2006) * This Life + 10 (2006) * Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End (2007) * Swingtown (2008) (TV) * The Key Man (2008) * The Boat That Rocked (2009) *A United Kingdom (2016) == Other websites == * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
